Text: Have no idea what youre talking about, please post this in english or german or slovenian or croatian or serbian just not like you did in swedish. Please!!!

What was said in the swedish post was basicly this is not necronomicon since there is NO real necronomicon. It's a fictional book used by HP Lovecraft in some of his novels and short stories and the link is to some HP lovecraft works.

I can assure you, The Necronomicon is no work of fiction. It is a very real book, perhaps too real.

however, this isn't it.
yes, there is... but the real ones have been destoyed. and those copies that remain are hidden away

Hidden away?! I bought the "real" Necronomicon on adlibris.com! If you read it you'll understand. It's not expensive. This is the text on the backside of the book:
HP Lovecraft himself denied the existens of the book Necronomicon. (blah blah and so forth)
Necronomicon was written in Damascus in the eighth century AD by the"ad Arab Abdul Alhazred" blah lah...
I will waith for the real book to be publish

foomonger you are so right I used to own this book and I burned the sonofabitch It scared the fuckin shit out of me. It is not fake at all. I only read a 1/4 of the book and my life turned to shit until I burned it. For those of you that think its fake go ahead read it (THE REAL VERSION) you will see, The real version even tells you from the begining it will screw with you. Most book stores carry it !!!!!!!!

I just got done reading the simon version. And not a thing has happend to me.  what is the "real" version? its kinda screwed up (simon version) and i mite actually try some of the crap in it.  Any of you had some of this stuff work?
